raw_tweets.content: Everyone needs an AGI pill, now (a blog post): medium.com/@juliavillagra/th…

Emotion is data. This is one of the reasons I love working with authentic people. Sadness, passion, frustration, skepticism, joy — it’s data. The best leaders realize this and create space for authenticity. Then the really good leaders contextualize it with all the other data and use it to make better decisions.
My @OpenAI new hire swag arrived today and in a nice touch, the packaging tape says “Research Preview” 👀👀👀

🌐 Introducing ChatGPT search 🌐

ChatGPT can now search the web in a much better way than before so you get fast, timely answers with links to relevant web sources.

openai.com/index/introducing…

Advanced Voice is rolling out to all Plus and Team users in the ChatGPT app over the course of the week.

While you’ve been patiently waiting, we’ve added Custom Instructions, Memory, five new voices, and improved accents.

It can also say “Sorry I’m late” in over 50 languages.

We're releasing a preview of OpenAI o1—a new series of AI models designed to spend more time thinking before they respond.

These models can reason through complex tasks and solve harder problems than previous models in science, coding, and math. openai.com/index/introducing…
Every paid ChatGPT user should now have access to OpenAI o1-preview!
Breaking news—we have a news handle.
OpenAI demos real-time language translation with its latest GPT-4o model.
We’ll be streaming live on openai.com at 10AM PT Monday, May 13 to demo some ChatGPT and GPT-4 updates.
